body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, attorney. Person County, North Carolina native. Married to Nancy E. Cox Clayton. Father of William Clayton. Farmer and tobacco merchant. Deputy sheriff of Webster County in 1859. United States census enumerator in Webster County in 1860. Served as clerk of the Webster County Court. Admitted to the bar in 1862.
